---
title: "bkmr causal mediation analysis"
author: "Aijin Wang"
date: "11/4/2019"
output: html_document
---

In this document, we illustrate how to use the causal mediation analysis part of functions from the $\tt{bkmr}$ R package through examples and graphs. Additional details can be found in
[Code and description to implement Bayesian Kernel Machine Regression-Causal Mediation Analysis by Devick et al. (arXiv: 1811.10453)](https://arxiv.org/abs/1811.10453)
